tool_description: Search hotels, see prices, photos of the hotels, reviews.  **Site:** www.hotels.com **Support**:  [tipsters@rapi.one](mailto:tipsters@rapi.one) / t.me/api_tipsters **Other travel api:** https://rapi.one
name: Hotels com Provider
title: Hotels com Provider

api_list.name: Hotel Details

test_endpoint.message: You are not subscribed to this API.

api_list.name: Hotel Info
Regions Search
api_list.description: Search region, locations, city or hotel by name

api_list.name: Hotel Slug convert
api_list.description: Get Hotel ID from Hotel Site slug, (https://hotels.com/ho219115) `ho219115` -> `1105156`

api_list.name: Domains List
api_list.description: Get a list of Domains, available domains code, currencies and locales
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hotels-com-provider.p.rapidapi.com/v2/domains"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hotels-com-provider.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://hotels-com-provider.p.rapidapi.com/v2/domains"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hotels-com-provider.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Hotels Search
api_list.description: Get hotels by the filter. Set the `domain`, it is necessary for localization at the currency setting. (meta / Domains List). `accessibility` parameter, needed to get ONLY available hotels. Indicate the `region_id` -> use `Region Search`, check-in and check-out date, number of adults and children

parameters.name: children_ages
parameters.description: The age of every child. Indicate their ages separated by commas. `4,0,15` -> three kids. `0` - less than a year

api_list.name: Hotel Rooms (offers)
api_list.description: Get available rooms at the hotel

parameters.name: children_ages
parameters.description: The age of every child. If children will be staying in the room, please indicate their ages separated by commas. 0-less than a year

utterances.utterance: Find available rooms for 2 adults at hotel 1105156 in the UAE, checking in on 2023-09-26 and checking out on 2023-09-27.
